ComicInfo.Title: Mercy and the Devil
ComicInfo.Summary:
Droog speaks to the reader, summarizing Fritz's exploitation movie career from its beginning fifteen years ago to now.
In this Fritz exploitation movie, she stars as a frequently nude retired porn actress/psychic who grifts men for a living, sometimes with her daughter Mercy as accomplice. Both leaving murder in their wake but only one of them eventually deciding to quit crime.
Four panel sequence featuring Killer's character Mercy on top of a hill, haunted by the murder she saw. Prelude to the main story.
